video_curation.video_repo¶

class video_curation.video_repo.VideoRepo(repo_paths, archive_item=None)[source]¶

An Video file repository. The local repository, by default, is assumed to be a collection of working directories (self.repo_paths) with two subfolders:

  • mp4: Containing mp4-s for every “episode” in the repository.
get_title_from_path(filepath)[source]¶
